TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProfileOptimization extends System.Object
public ref class ProfileOptimization abstract sealed

summary.span: 根據先前編譯期間所建立的設定檔，對可能要執行的方法執行背景編譯，改善需要 Just-In-Time (JIT) 編譯器之應用程式的應用程式定義域啟動效能。

span.span: Improves the startup performance of application domains in applications that require the just-in-time (JIT) compiler by performing background compilation of methods that are likely to be executed, based on profiles created during previous compilations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定檔最佳化需要多核心的電腦。Profile optimization requires a multicore computer. 方法會忽略其他電腦上。The methods are ignored on other computers. 起始應用程式定義域中的設定檔最佳化每次會讀取先前使用期間所建立的設定檔。Each time you initiate profile optimization in an application domain, the profile that was created during the previous use is read. 設定檔中的資訊用來引導背景編譯藉由識別最有可能在啟動期間執行的方法。The information in the profile is used to guide background compilation by identifying the methods that are most likely to be executed during startup. 多核心電腦上，這會增加機率的方法已編譯它，讓主應用程式執行緒並沒有呼叫 JIT 編譯器所需的時間。On multicore computers, this increases the chances that a method is already compiled by the time it is needed so that the main application thread does not have to call the JIT compiler. 因此它一律包含最新的資訊，了解哪種方法可在啟動期間，每個使用時，會覆寫設定檔。The profile file is overwritten on each use, so it always contains the most recent information about which methods are used during startup. 最佳化設定檔不會限制應用程式定義域啟動的。Optimization profiles are not restricted to application domain startup. 它們可以用於需要大量 JIT 編譯器使用的任何活動。They can be used for any activity that will require heavy use of the JIT compiler. 您可以維護應用程式定義域的多個設定檔，以便每個這類活動都有它自己的設定檔。You can maintain multiple profiles for an application domain so that each such activity has its own profile. 若要使用應用程式定義域中的最佳化設定檔，您必須呼叫方法並指定儲存設定檔的資料夾。To use optimization profiles in an application domain, you must call the method and specify the folder where profiles are stored. 資料夾必須已經存在。The folder must already exist. 若要開始使用設定檔，請呼叫方法並指定設定檔的檔案名稱。To begin using a profile, call the method and specify the file name of the profile. 如果沒有先前記錄的檔案，它會建立第一次使用。If the file was not recorded previously, it is created on first use. 沒有效能優點的第一個時間建立設定檔。There is no performance benefit the first time a profile is created. 設定檔最佳化不會變更的方法執行的順序。Profile optimization does not change the order in which methods are executed. 方法不會在背景執行緒上執行如果方法是編譯，但永遠不會呼叫，它只是不會使用。Methods are not executed on the background thread; if a method is compiled but never called, it is simply not used. 如果設定檔已損毀或無法寫入指定的資料夾 （例如，因為該資料夾不存在），程式會繼續執行而不需要最佳化程式碼剖析。If a profile file is corrupt or cannot be written to the specified folder (for example, because the folder does not exist), program execution continues without optimization profiling.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SetProfileRoot(string directoryPath) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetProfileRoot (directoryPath As String)

param.name: directoryPath
param.span: 存放設定檔（用於目前應用程式定義域）的資料夾的完整路徑。

span.span: The full path to the folder where profile files are stored for the current application domain.

summary.span: 啟用對目前應用程式定義域的最佳化程式碼剖析，並設定儲存最佳化設定檔的資料夾。

span.span: Enables optimization profiling for the current application domain, and sets the folder where the optimization profile files are stored.

summary.span: 單核心電腦上，這個方法會被忽略。

span.span: On a single-core computer, the method is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須先呼叫這個方法，然後再呼叫第一次目前的應用程式定義域中的方法。You must call this method before you call the method for the first time in the current application domain. 如果您呼叫一次以上相同的應用程式定義域中，第一個以外的所有呼叫會被都忽略。If you call more than once in the same application domain, all calls after the first are ignored. 指定的資料夾必須已經存在。The specified folder must already exist. 如果不存在，呼叫這個方法不會建立它，並沒有程式碼剖析。If it does not exist, calling this method does not create it, and no profiling occurs. 在電腦上並沒有多個核心，這個方法會被忽略。On computers that do not have multiple cores, this method is ignored.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void StartProfile(string profile) cil managed
Public Shared Sub StartProfile (profile As String)

param.name: profile
param.span: 要使用的設定檔的檔案名稱。

span.span: The file name of the profile to use.

summary.span: 在背景執行緒中，對先前指定設定檔名稱中記錄的方法啟動 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯。

span.span: Starts just-in-time (JIT) compilation of the methods that were previously recorded in the specified profile file, on a background thread.

summary.span: 開始錄製目前的方法使用，稍後會覆寫指定的設定檔檔案。

span.span: Starts the process of recording current method use, which later overwrites the specified profile file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的設定檔存在於所指定的資料夾方法，其內含的資訊用來判斷編譯背景執行緒的方法的順序。If the specified profile exists in the folder specified by the method, the information it contains is used to determine the order in which methods are compiled on the background thread. 方法建立設定檔，如果它不存在，並初始方法使用的記錄。The method creates the profile if it does not already exist, and initiates the recording of method use. 會記錄實際呼叫的方法，不論它們是否已編譯主應用程式執行緒或背景執行緒上。Only methods that are actually called are recorded, regardless of whether they were compiled on the background thread or on the main application thread. 方法會編譯在主應用程式的執行緒上，如果應用程式需要在背景執行緒已編譯它之前呼叫它。A method is compiled on the main application thread if the application needs to call it before the background thread has compiled it. 執行記錄的程式碼會追蹤的速率的方法會進行編譯，包括會編譯這兩個背景執行緒與主執行緒上的方法。The code that performs the recording tracks the rate at which methods are compiled, including methods that are compiled on both the background thread and on the main thread. 當速率低於預先定義的層級，記錄就會停止。When the rate falls below a predetermined level, recording stops. 如果在 JIT 編譯的速率超過預先決定的時間上限，也會停止記錄。Recording also stops if the rate of JIT compilation exceeds a predetermined upper limit. 如果目前的應用程式定義域中，尚未呼叫方法或電腦並沒有多個核心，如果方法沒有任何作用。If the method has not been called for the current application domain, or if the computer does not have multiple cores, the method has no effect.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
